name: Fake Call Girlfriend Joke
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Girlfriend Call.
Fake Call Girlfriend joke - a joke app is a game where you can make it look as if calling you friend! Raffle friends, including fake call a friend to a friend and show that you have a girlfriend!
Share close, let think that calling your fictional girl! Make fun of a lot of fun!
In the game you can choose different girls to call! A real blast and a voice straight out of the tube!
ATTENTION! This is not a real but only an imitation of the call! The app does not bear any harm and is only for fun!
Thank you for playing with us leave us your feedback and we will try to make our game even better!
